title: NOW
description: Former porn star, Krysta Now’s topical-discussion-chat-reality show. Tune in for in-depth discussions of the penetrating issues facing society today like abortion, terrorism, crime, poverty, social reform, quantum teleportation, teen horniness, and war.
quote: Violence is a big problem in our society today, and I will not support it. That’s the primary reason why I won’t do anal.
